anya-e0605n:10_0: Yo lokatthāya buddho dhanasutabhariyāaṅgajīve cajitvā pūretvā āramiyo tidasamanupame bodhipakkhīyadhamme,
anya-e0605n:11_0: Patvā bodhiṃ visuddhaṃ sakalaguṇadadaṃ seṭṭhabhūto tiloke,
anya-e0605n:12_0: Katvā dukkhassa antaṃ katasubhajanataṃ dukkhato mocayittha.
anya-e0605n:15_0: Nāhu yenapi tulyo kusalamahimato uttamo bhūtaloke tassevāyaṃ uvimhaṃ suvipulamamalaṃ bodhisambhārabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0605n:16_0: Hetuṃ hetvānurūpaṃ sugatagataphalaṃ bhāsato me suṇātha.
anya-e0605n:19_0: Jāto yo navame khaṇe sutadharo sīlena suddhindriyo saṃsāraṃ ayato bhavakkayakaraṃ disvā sivaṃ khemato,
anya-e0605n:20_0: Taṃ sampāpakamaggadesakamuniṃ sampūjayanto tato uddhānussatibhāvanādikamato sampādaye taṃ sivaṃ.
anya-e0605n:23_0: Buddhoti ko buddhaguṇo ti ko so,
anya-e0605n:48_0: Ye tesu devā manujā ca brahmā,
anya-e0605n:73_0: Na tena tulyo paramo ca vijjati;
anya-e0605n:74_0: Kiṃ taṃ guṇaṃ taṃ sadisena dinnaṃ,
anya-e0605n:117_0: Uppannuppannake so jinavaramatule pūjayitvā asesaṃ buddho eso hi oso bhavati niyamato byākato tehi tehi
anya-e0605n:117_1: tesaṃ tesaṃ jinānaṃ acanamanupamaṃ pūjayitvā sirena,
anya-e0605n:118_0: Taṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ sahitvā sakalaguṇadadaṃ pāramī pūrayittha.
anya-e0605n:173_0: Sato ca sampajāno ca mātukucchimhi okkami;
anya-e0605n:177_0: Tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā va sā mātā puttaṃ passati kucchiyaṃ.
anya-e0605n:186_0: Devā ca nāgā asurā ca yakkhā;
anya-e0605n:211_0: Sīhanādaṃ nadī tesaṃ devatānaṃ hi sāvayaṃ.
anya-e0605n:213_0: Tato puttaṃ gahetvāna gatā mātā sakaṅgharaṃ,
anya-e0605n:227_0: Kālakkamena cando va vaḍḍhanto vaḍḍhite kule,
anya-e0605n:230_0: Siddhathako hi siddhattho laddhā deviṃ yasodharaṃ,
anya-e0605n:238_0: Namo tassa yato mahimato yassa tamo na
anya-e0605n:324_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:329_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:334_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:339_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:344_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:359_0: Naccanti tā surapure vaṇitā va tāva.
anya-e0605n:379_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n:384_0: Disvādisvā iti ratikaraṃ yāti hāhā kimīhā.
anya-e0605n:390_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:395_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:400_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:405_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:410_0: Hitvā gata so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:415_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:420_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n:436_0: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n:441_0: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n:451_0: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n:481_0: Tathā hi māro pi tadāha santiṃ,
anya-e0605n:497_0: Lokāyātatayā kālo visesaṃ na na saṃsevi,
anya-e0605n:498_0: Visesaṃ na na saṃsevi lokā yātatayā kālo.
anya-e0605n:505_0: Kaṅkhāgāhakakaṅkhāgha hā hā kaṅkhā kahaṃ kahaṃ.
anya-e0605n:518_0: Nunnānenāni nūna na nānanaṃ nānanena no.
anya-e0605n:523_0: Devānaṃ nandano devo devadeva na nandi no,
anya-e0605n:566_0: Datvāna maṃsaṃ rajjaṃ pitā suddhodano tadā,
anya-e0605n:575_0: Etha gaṇgatha bandhatha chaṭṭetha ceṭakaṃ imaṃ,
anya-e0605n:581_0: Cakkāvudhaṃ khipento pi nāsakkhi kiñci kātave,
anya-e0605n:584_0: Siddhattha kasmā āsi nu āsane mama santake,
anya-e0605n:585_0: Uṭṭhehi āsanā no ce phālemi hadayaṃ tava.
anya-e0605n:588_0: Pitā vudikkhi taṃ māraṃ mettāyanto dayaparo.
anya-e0605n:590_0: Tadā so asambhivācaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadī muni,
anya-e0605n:591_0: Na jānāti sayaṃ mayhaṃ dāsabhāvapiyaṃ khaḷo.
anya-e0605n:593_0: Yena kenaci kammena jāto devapure vare,
anya-e0605n:603_0: Ko hi nāma kareyyañño anummatto sacetano.
anya-e0605n:608_0: Nāhaṃ manussomanusso na brahmā na ca devatā,
anya-e0605n:612_0: Buddho bodhitale hutvā tāremi janataṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0605n:614_0: Samantā dhajinaṃ disvā yuddhaṃ māraṃ savāhanaṃ,
anya-e0605n:615_0: Yuddhāya paccugacchāmi mā maṃ ṭhānā acāvayi.
anya-e0605n:617_0: Yante taṃ nappasahati senaṃ loko sadevako,
anya-e0605n:618_0: Tante paññāya gacchāmi āmaṃ pattaṃ va asmanā.
anya-e0605n:620_0: Icchanto sāsape gabbhe caṅkamāmi ito cito,
anya-e0605n:624_0: Atthi thāmaṃ balaṃ mayhaṃ pāṇaghāto na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0605n:627_0: Mayhaṃ hi tena pāpena sallāpo pi na yujjati.
anya-e0605n:630_0: Kampitā maddiyā dānā sakkhi hoti ayaṃ mahī.
anya-e0605n:632_0: Iti vatvā dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ pathaviyā paṇamayi,
anya-e0605n:636_0: Tasmiṃ majjhe gato māro sapariso bhayatajjito.
anya-e0605n:642_0: Purato gacchati cando rajatacakkaṃ va ambare,
anya-e0605n:648_0: Sakko tasmiṃ khaṇe saṅkhaṃ dhamanto abhidhāvati,
anya-e0605n:654_0: Evaṃ dasasahassamhi sakko brahmā ca devatā,
anya-e0605n:660_0: Tattha naccanti gāyanti seḷenti vādayanti ca,
anya-e0605n:687_0: Tato hi dutiye yāme yathāyammupage sari,
anya-e0605n:693_0: Tato so tatiye yāme dvādasaṅge asesato,
anya-e0605n:703_0: Paññāya mohaṃ chetvāna micchādiṭṭhi tatheva ca.
anya-e0605n:711_0: Evaṃ dānādinā taṃ taṃ kilesaṇgaṃ vinodayaṃ,
anya-e0605n:712_0: Suvaḍḍhitā mahāpaññā kathaṃ santiṃ na rūhati.
anya-e0605n:718_0: Ekkattha dāni sampattiṃ deti bodhiṃ asaṃsayaṃ.
anya-e0605n:723_0: Savāsane kilese so jhāpentonumattaṃ pi ca,
anya-e0605n:748_0: Addhā laddhā suladdhaṃ vatamiti satataṃ cintayanto subodhiṃ;
anya-e0605n:756_0: Na pūjaye ko hi naro sacetano.
anya-e0605n:784_0: Ye pissa te bhagavato ca acintiyādī,
anya-e0605n:810_0: Takkabyākaraṇañca dhammavinayaṃ sutvā pi yo paññavā,
anya-e0605n:812_0: Hetuñcāpi phalena tena saphalaṃ sampassamāno tato bodhiṃ saddahateva tassa mahatāvāyamato sambhavaṃ.
anya-e0605n:831_0: Thalaje jalaje vāpi sugandhe ca agandhake.
anya-e0605n:846_0: Vassikā mallikā sālā koviḷārā ca pāṭali.
anya-e0605n:848_0: Indīvarā asokā ca kaṇikārā ca makulā,
anya-e0605n:851_0: Ete caññe ca rukkhā ca valliyo cāpi pupphitā,
anya-e0605n:855_0: Kāḷā setā ca mañjaṭṭha nekavaṇṇā supupphitā.
anya-e0605n:863_0: Athetta sakuṇā santi dijā mañjussarā subhā,
anya-e0605n:870_0: Tasmiṃ hi kinnarā kiccaṃ padīpena karīyati.
anya-e0605n:876_0: Sakuṇānaṃ hi saddena mayūrānaṃ hi kekayā.
anya-e0605n:881_0: Pabbatānaṃ hi obhāsā maṇīnaṃ jotiyāpi ca,
anya-e0605n:883_0: Evaṃ sabbaṅgasampannaṃ kiṃ siyā nandanaṃ vanaṃ.
anya-e0605n:890_0: Nāgaloke manusse ca deve brahme ca yaṃ siyā,
anya-e0605n:897_0: Buddho bodhesi sattānaṃ tassa pūjemi taṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0605n:899_0: Khomaṃ koseyyaṃ kappāsaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅgañca kambalaṃ,
anya-e0605n:900_0: Dukūlāni ca dibbāni dussāni vividhāni te.
anya-e0605n:903_0: Yassa siddhaṃ siyā tassa dussāni pujayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n:956_0: Svāyaṃ dhammo vinayo ca desito sādhukaṃ mayā,
anya-e0605n:957_0: Mamaccayena so satthā dhātu cāpi sarīrajā.
anya-e0605n:965_0: Tasmā hi tassa saddhammaṃ uggaṇhitvā yathātathaṃ,
anya-e0605n:966_0: Yo deseti sambuddho ti natvāna pūjayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n:977_0: Yattha katthaci sayito āsinno caṅkamepi vā,
anya-e0605n:980_0: Na sañjānanti ye buddhaṃ evarūpo ti ñātve,
anya-e0605n:981_0: Kataṃ taṃ paṭimaṃ sabbaṃ natvāna pūjayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n:995_0: Paññā ca me sijjhatu yāva bodhiṃ.
anya-e0605n:1004_0: Bhogo ca kāyo ca mamesa laddho,
